description:
Meet the strong and silent type on 2 wheels. This city e-bike is all fun and function, opening up new possibilities in your urban empire. Its sleek design wraps a MAHLE drive unit and battery in the rear hub and frame. Result? A bike that just looks like a bike. Except it's got extra pop when you need it.

  • Smartform C3 alloy frame and carbon fork, with relaxed riding geometry
  • MAHLE ebikemotion X35 drive unit, with 3 levels of pedal assist
  • Motor drive in the rear hub, with concealed down tube battery
  • To keep your battery performing at its best, follow the manufacturer’s guidelines regarding storage and charging conditions (e-Bike batteries can be very sensitive to cold temperatures)
  • 1x9 drive train pairs a 38T chain ring with an 11-36T cassette
  • Rack and fender mounts
  • Shimano Altus groupset
  • Hydraulic disc brakes
  • 38c clincher tires
  • Optional extra batteries (sold separately)
  • Wheel sensor pairs with your phone via the free Cannondale app and uses Garmin™ technology to record your rides, provide your: time, speed, distance, calories, etc. and it even tells you about your carbon offset. The app also provides reminders for needed services, tracks service history and more
  • Wheel sensor works with ANT+® or Bluetooth® and uses an easily replaceable 2032 battery that lasts more than a year
  • Included: MAHLE ebikemotion X35 charger, Herman H Trace rear light and Cannondale wheel sensor
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC Bike Shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Quick Neo 2 SL Remixte E-Bicycle - Unisex
